EmailTemplate.description: Added after go-live to differentiate from First Defect Notice
EmailTemplate.name: Follow-up Defect Notice NINTEX
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow-Up Defect Notice: {!Rejection__c.Application_Type__c} Application# {!Rejection__c.Registration_Number__c} for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The application for {!Rejection__c.Legal_Entity_Name__c} has been reviewed and defected for not meeting all of the application requirements. Please review the attached Follow-up Defect Notice, which lists each specific defect in your application.
You are required to complete the requested adjustments to your application and re-submit it within 30 days from the date of the First Defect Notice email, this Follow-Up Defect Notice serves as a courtesy to inform you that there are still pending requirements.
To log in and make changes, please visit https://cadir.my.site.com/registrations.
Please follow the steps below:
Log in to your dashboard and click update under the license number. Provide the requested information. Go to the "Submission" section. Select "Yes" to the question "Resubmit Application due to Pending Defect". Click <Submit>.
Sincerely,
Licensing & Registration Labor Commissioner's Office Department of Industrial Relations State of California
